name: DuelVR
description:
DuelVR is a multiplayer VR showdown where two duelers will compete on who builds their weapon first to shoot and defeat their enemy. Enjoy this complete stadium experience utilizing the HTC Vive!

Made in two days during the San Diego Game Jam utilizing the Unity Engine, Photon Networking package and the amazing NewtonVR Physics package. Thanks Tommorrow Labs for this amazing source!
